attributes.action: Ban Huawei involvement from Britain’s 5G network.
attributes.additional_details: Most of all I demand an explanation of why we are aware of British, European and other telecom giants involvement with the 5G network yet the government try their upmost to keep Huawei involvement from us.
attributes.background: I am calling on everyone to sign this petition banning Huawei involvement in the 5G network, and all of our industries. The Chinese government has and does use Chinese businesses and companies to spy which there are no doubts.
